body_html:
Still the same behavior when running:

with tf.Graph().as_default():
  NSO = tf.name_scope('ns_outer').__enter__()

  VSO = tf.variable_scope('vs_outer', auxiliary_name_scope=False)

  with tf.name_scope(NSO):
    with tf.name_scope('ns_inner_1'):
      with VSO:
        print((tf.constant(1.0, name='const')))

  with tf.name_scope(NSO):
    with tf.name_scope('ns_inner_2'):
      with VSO:
        print((tf.constant(1.0, name='const')))

body:
Still the same behavior when running:
```python
with tf.Graph().as_default():
  NSO = tf.name_scope('ns_outer').__enter__()

  VSO = tf.variable_scope('vs_outer', auxiliary_name_scope=False)

  with tf.name_scope(NSO):
    with tf.name_scope('ns_inner_1'):
      with VSO:
        print((tf.constant(1.0, name='const')))

  with tf.name_scope(NSO):
    with tf.name_scope('ns_inner_2'):
      with VSO:
        print((tf.constant(1.0, name='const')))

```
